rdf:Description.dc:title: Make it safe, make it visible : safe transport of farm equipment in Alberta 2009 safe transport of farm equipment in Alberta.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Canada West Equipment Dealers Association.
Alberta. Alberta Agriculture and Rural Development. Farm Safety Program.
Alberta. Alberta Transportation. Vehicle Safety Section.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Alberta Agriculture and Rural Development,
rdf:Description.dc:description: "...a joint project between Alberta Agriculture and Rural Development (Farm Safety Program), Alberta Transportation (Vehicle Safety Section) and Canada West Equipment Dealers Association."--Acknowledgements.

"This information contained in this publication is presented to assist equipment owners and operators to meet safe operating conditions. It does not replace or supersede the Traffic Safety Act and regulations under the Act and is not a legal document for law enforcement."--inside front cover.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Agricultural machinery
